How the hell is this even close?  —  It boggles the mind.  But it's not unexplainable. … The presidential election remains a coin toss, which in and of itself isn't unusual.  Most presidential elections since 2000 have been very close.  Even 2008, the lone blowout, was a nail-biter until the very end of the campaign.
